test.name: Do a POST user login to get token

kw.name: Do a POST user login
Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: ${body} = {'username': 'mor_2314', 'password': '83r5^_'}

kw.name: POST
kw.doc: Sends a POST request.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://fakestoreapi.com/auth/login path_url=/auth/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.30.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '46', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"username": "mor_2314", "password": "83r5^_"}'
${response} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: {'token': 'eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOjIsInVzZXIiOiJtb3JfMjMxNCIsImlhdCI6MTY4NTkwOTMyOH0.MDrVvrMi8SuMLdCqQM5LeRQBhGJhzpiCgVRxqpPgAgs'}
${response} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: {'token': 'eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOjIsInVzZXIiOiJtb3JfMjMxNCIsImlhdCI6MTY4NTkwOTMyOH0.MDrVvrMi8SuMLdCqQM5LeRQBhGJhzpiCgVRxqpPgAgs'}

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.
kw.msg: ${body} = {"token":"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOjIsInVzZXIiOiJtb3JfMjMxNCIsImlhdCI6MTY4NTkwOTMyOH0.MDrVvrMi8SuMLdCqQM5LeRQBhGJhzpiCgVRxqpPgAgs"}

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

test.doc: Run the "auth/login" request to fetch to token. Keywords located in ../../resources/common_post.resource

test.name: Do a GET all products request

kw.name: Create session to the Web Service
Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=fakeshop_session, url=https://fakestoreapi.com, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0

kw.name: Do GET request on all products
GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

No compatibility for VESA Mount Refresh Rate: 75Hz - Using HDMI port Zero-frame design | ultra-thin | 4ms response time | IPS panel Aspect ratio - 16: 9. Color Supported - 16. 7 million colors. Brightness - 250 nit Tilt angle -5 degree to 15 degree. Horizontal viewing angle-178 degree. test.doc: Running the GET all products request in order to get information about all the product. Validation includes: StatusCode as 200 and some of the returned keys in the body: id:{}, title:'...', price:'...', category:'...', description:'...', image:'...', ... Keywords located in ../../resources/common_get.resource
